hero.name: Naruto Uzumaki
hero.specialAbility:
Naruto has a lot of chakra and stamina, when your deck is empty reshuffle your discard pile.
Jinchūriki Transformations.

cards.title: Kage Bunshin no Jutsu
cards.basicText: Add new clones, adjacent to Naruto (all available).

cards.title: To merges with clones
cards.basicText: Shuffle Naruto with clones which in same zone with real. Don't show where real Naruto to your opponent.

cards.title: Rasengan
cards.duringText:
if there at least 1 clone 
adjacent you: rise value by 1
cards.afterText: if you win move target up 1 space

cards.title: Uzumaki Naruto Rendan
cards.duringText: Damage will increase by 1 for each clone adjacent to the target
cards.afterText: If you lose, remove all clones involved in the combat (except active if it a clone)

cards.title: Senjutsu Chakra
cards.basicText: Choose one clone that will accumulate natural chakra and move it up to 3 space. Or add a new in same zone. Now this clone cannot do any actions and use defense card. On the next turn, you can boost double maneuver, attack or defense value in combat removing the clone.

cards.title: For My Next Trick
cards.afterText: Move one of your clone up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.

cards.title: Taijutsu
cards.immediateText: If you can and if you attacker, create new clone adjacent you.
cards.duringText:
if there at least 1 clone 
adjacent target: rise value by 1.
cards.afterText: If you use a clone in combat and lose, remove that clone.

cards.title: demon fox cloak
cards.immediateText: Cancel all damage effects on your opponent's card.
cards.afterText: if you win, move opposing fighter by 2 spaces away from you.

cards.title: demon fox tails
cards.duringText: Deal 1 damage to each opposing fighter adjacent to you
cards.afterText: If you win, move opposing fighter by 2 space away from you.

ruleCards.content:
Clones: Real Naruto marked below the miniature. Start with 2 clone.
Senjutsu Chakra: In preparation, you can mark one clone to collect natural chakra as if by using a card senjutsu chakra.
Jinchūriki Transformations: When Narute has 4 or less HP he gets his jinchuriki form. Remove all clones from field, all cards that naruto allowed to use now can be used as booster of attack and defense in combat (one card in one combat).
ruleCards.title: Extra rules
